review: I will be returning mine any moment now.This is the most overrated home TV device I have seen in years.  The interface is ugly and difficult to use - really, AppleTV does it better across the board, and Roku comes in after that.I have never been able to get the "speak to search" to work.  As soon as I try, it just cuts me off and tries to do a  search for NOTHING after it claims it listened to me.  This has been since Day One.  I gave up trying.The hardware specs are great here... but they do not matter if what you have is hard and ugly to use.  And FireTV's interface is both hard and ugly.Admittedly, I did not try any of the gaming, though I did hear great things about it.  I am not a gamer, so I just don't care.  I just wanted a TV streaming device that was easy to use.  I didn't get it, so I will stick with my AppleTV.It would have been better if Amazon didn't mix in the pay-per-view along with the Amazon Prime "free" video.  There should at least be a universal command limiting the display for Prime subscribers can see only what comes with Prime.The tile approach of the interface is ugly.  It is not very efficient except with the speed the interface zips along.  But given how it is designed, that means that you can very quickly see a whole bunch of things that you are not looking for.  The design of the search also disallows an easy search and search results.  Everything about the use of the FireTV was just annoying.

review: I have had a FireTV Stick for a while and recently picked up a FireTV box with the SlingTV offer. We stream TV and Movies with it. I don't play games on this device. My pros and cons:Pros:** Seems to run faster than my FireTV Stick and is a heck of a lot faster than the built-in apps on my Visio TV.** $50 with the SlingTV offer is a steal for what you get.** Optical out is a nice touch.** Comes with the voice search remote.Cons:** Voice search doesn't work well for me.** The device will not wake from sleep mode unlike my FireTV Stick.** Doesn't play media from a USB drive.** A QWERTY type keyboard might be nice.The only thing holding this device back from perfection is the ability to play media off of a USB source.
